title: China to allow couples to have up to three children in attempt to reverse falling birth rates
content:
1. China to allow couples to have up to three children in attempt to reverse falling birth rates  CNN
  2. China allows couples to have three children  BBC News
  3. Facing ageing population, China allows couples to have up to three children  FRANCE 24 English
  4. Reactions to China's new three-child policy  Reuters
  5. China to Ease Limits on Births, Allowing Couples to Have Three Children  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
China to allow couples to have up to three children in attempt to reverse falling birth rates  CNN

Reactions to China's new three-child policy  Reuters

localize.title: 中国、少子化対策として夫婦間で最大3人の子供を持てるようにする
中国将允许夫妇最多生育三个孩子，试图扭转出生率下降的趋势
中國將允許夫婦最多生育三個孩子，試圖扭轉出生率下降的趨勢
